subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: For the first time since 2000, both the men’s and women’s American teams will be named at the Olympic trials, which will be held June 28-July 1 in San Jose, Calif.
snippet: For the first time since 2000, both the men’s and women’s American teams will be named at the Olympic trials, which will be held June 28-July 1 in San Jose, Calif.
